## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To meet the forecasted demand, considering a margin of error. Current stock + player's purchase + recommended order will cover the next 5 days, with some buffer for potential demand fluctuations.  |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     |  The recommended order size is 10,000 units higher than the player's planned purchase to ensure ample stock to cover potential fluctuations in demand. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     |  4.5 days                               |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   |  5.5 days                               |
| Comments                          |  The recommendation prioritizes meeting demand and accounts for the current stock level and potential variations in demand, while utilizing a vendor order quantity that minimizes excess inventory. |
